name: Ext_R2_ReferralRequest_serviceRequested
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ReferralRequest.serviceRequested for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ReferralRequest.serviceRequested from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ReferralRequest|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Actions requested as part of the referral
element.definition: The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.code` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.code`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Actions requested as part of the referral
element.definition: The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.code` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.code`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes indicating the types of services that might be requested as part of a referral.
